channel.title: Homes on Rahul Gupta
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Rahul Gupta

item.description: Biography I am a fourth year undergraduate student pursuing B.Tech - M.Tech(Dual Degree) in Computer Science at Indian Institute of Technology, Kanpur. My research interest lies in Knowledge Compilations, Cyber Security and AI. I am currently on working on Knowledge Compilation methods under Prof. Kuldeep Meel and Prof. Subhajit Roy. Recently, my work on securing databases from insider attacks using Blockchains got published in workshop at ISRDC, IIT Bombay. I interned at Microsoft in the last summer.
